column4: Hello, please, how can I delete Ubuntu 9.10 from my disc? I have it installed as the only system, I want to totally uninstall it and then install MS Windows with Ubuntu 10.04 LTS...
No, I installed it only yesterday.
mg... How do I install Windows? Again, when I try to boot from Windows CD, it automatically runs Ubuntu.
you have to set the CD/DVD drive as 1st boot device, goto BIOS setup and change it
